200.description: An array of trending metrics for a given account, with an aggregate for each month provided as a time series.
Information relating to certifications and basic university activity metrics
An Array of agent details for each agent in an account.
An Array of agent version summary for all environments in an account, grouped by environment.
Provides month over month and combined problem insights for the given time range and environments in an account
Services and process group insights details, divided by up by service type and technology.
